articles.author: Natalie Grover, Noah Browning
articles.title: Oil prices slide as Red Sea transport disruptions ease - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices fell more than 1% on Thursday as concerns eased about shipping disruptions along the Red Sea route, even as tensions in the Middle East continue to fester.
articles.content:
LONDON, Dec 28 (Reuters) - Oil prices fell more than 1% on Thursday as concerns eased about shipping disruptions along the Red Sea route, even as tensions in the Middle East continue to fester.
